column4: hey I have pidgin and empathy installed,  and I always use pidgin, but sometime empathy just starts and logs in to my accounts disturbing my pidgin sessions and causing me to lose some messages
is there any possible way to avoid this without removing empathy from my system?
I have a theory: if I dont use a program I remove it :p
I also have that theory :D except that It already occured twice that pidgin wasn't able to connect when empathy was ;)
